Arrangement.text:
[G]Be Thou my [Em]vision O [G]lord of my [Bm]heart [C]Nought be al[D]l else to m[Em]e, save that Tho[D]u art [Em]Thou my best [G]thought, by [Em]day or by [D]night [G]Waking or [Em]sleeping, Thy [C]presence my[G] light.
[G]Be Thou my [Em]wisdom, [G]Thou my true [Bm]word [C]I eve[D]r with Thee[Em], Thou with me[D], Lord [Em]Thou my great [G]Father and [Em]I Thy true [D]son; [G]Thou in me [Em]dwelling, and [C]I with The[G]e one.
[G]Riches I [Em]heed not, nor [G]man's empty [Bm]praise [C]Thou mine in[D]heritance [Em]now and [D]always [Em]Thou and Thou [G]only, [Em]first in my [D]heart [G]High King of [Em]heaven, my [C]treasure Thou [G]art.
[G]High King of [Em]heaven, after [G]victory [Bm]won, [C]May I reac[D]h heaven's joys[Em], O bright heaven'[D]s Sun! [Em]Heart of my [G]own heart, wha[Em]tever be[D]fall, [G]Still be my [Em]vision, O[C] Ruler [G]of all.
Arrangement.searchtext: be thou my vision o lord of my heart nought be all else to me save that thou art thou my best thought by day or by night waking or sleeping thy presence my light be thou my wisdom thou my true word i ever with thee thou with me lord thou my great father and i thy true son thou in me dwelling and i with thee one riches i heed not nor mans empty praise thou mine inheritance now and always thou and thou only first in my heart high king of heaven my treasure thou art high king of heaven after victory won may i reach heavens joys o bright heavens sun heart of my own heart whatever befall still be my vision o ruler of all
